name: CreateGcpStsAccount
description:
Create a new GCP STS account entry in Datadog.

Use this tool to create a new entry within Datadog for your STS-enabled Google Cloud Platform service account.

parameters.name: gcp_sts_account_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing GCP STS account attributes like account tags, client email, and configurations for security and monitoring.

account_tags.description: Tags to be associated with GCP metrics and service checks from your account.

automute.description: Silence monitors for expected GCE instance shutdowns.

cloud_run_revision_filters.description:
List of filters to limit the Cloud Run revisions that are pulled into Datadog by using tags.
Only Cloud Run revision resources that apply to specified filters are imported into Datadog.
**Note:** This field is deprecated. Instead, use `monitored_resource_configs` with `type=cloud_run_revision`

host_filters.description:
List of filters to limit the VM instances that are pulled into Datadog by using tags.
Only VM instance resources that apply to specified filters are imported into Datadog.
**Note:** This field is deprecated. Instead, use `monitored_resource_configs` with `type=gce_instance`

is_cspm_enabled.description: When enabled, Datadog will activate the Cloud Security Monitoring product for this service account. Note: This requires resource_collection_enabled to be set to true.

is_per_project_quota_enabled.description: When enabled, Datadog applies the `X-Goog-User-Project` header, attributing Google Cloud billing and quota usage to the project being monitored rather than the default service account project.

is_resource_change_collection_enabled.description: When enabled, Datadog scans for all resource change data in your Google Cloud environment.

is_security_command_center_enabled.description: When enabled, Datadog will attempt to collect Security Command Center Findings. Note: This requires additional permissions on the service account.

disabled.description: When disabled, Datadog does not collect metrics that are related to this GCP metric namespace.

id.description: The id of the GCP metric namespace.

filters.description:
List of filters to limit the monitored resources that are pulled into Datadog by using tags.
Only monitored resources that apply to specified filters are imported into Datadog.

type.description: The GCP monitored resource type. Only a subset of resource types are supported.

resource_collection_enabled.description: When enabled, Datadog scans for all resources in your GCP environment.

attributes.description: Attributes associated with your service account.

data.description: Additional metadata on your generated service account.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

account_tags.description: Tags to be associated with GCP metrics and service checks from your account.
